column2: By having many members of [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty become the Pope we have proved the christendom piety of our dynasty. Members of our dynasty will be favored when choosing a new pope and our dynasty members are more likely to become canonized.
A very prestigious event

Rather than wasting lives and wealth after dreams of new conquest, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] wealth to the improvement of [Root.GetHerHis] own realm, constructing many great works during the course of [Root.GetHerHis] reign, improving the prestige of [Root.GetHerHis] realm.\nWhile some would consider it wasteful, those great works  no doubt raised the standing of [Root.GetHerHis] realm among all others.\nVassals of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will forever remember [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s efforts to rise the realm.

Rather than wasting lives and wealth after dreams of new conquest, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] wealth to the improvement of [Root.GetHerHis] own realm and [Root.GetHerHis] religion, constructing many great works during the course of [Root.GetHerHis] reign, improving the prestige of [Root.GetHerHis] realm and faith of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nThanks to [Root.GetHerHis] contribution for building great temples [Root.Religion.GetName] becomes stronger in the hearths of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nVassals and clergy will forever remember [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s efforts.
Wonderful news
Characters tend to become §GZealous§! and are more likely to get §Gcanonized§

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] reformed [Root.Religion.GetName] faith into an organized religion to make a belief system that can stand upto and surpass other organized religions.

[This.Mother.GetFirstNameWithNick], mother of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick], claimes she got pregnant while still a virgin like The Virgin Mary.

[This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty is famous for marrying within family to keep their lands united and inbred children born from those marriages.

Vassilyev Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is one of the most fertile woman middle ages ever saw. Although many admired her fertility, many including the church frowned upon her illicit releationships.

This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is one of the most fertile woman middle ages ever saw. Everyone admires her fertility.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is an excellent raider and one of the best Nordic leader ever seen. [This.GetSheHe] managed to imprison and sacrifice Pope, Ecumenical Patriarch and The Caliph in the one blot.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is the seventh son of a seventh son.It is said seventh son of a seventh son will be a gifted healer and have super powers. As for whether they are true only time will tell.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, [This.GetFirstName] tried it... and [This.GetFirstName] liked it and continued to eat human meat.

Invasion of Aztecs seemed almost unstoppable. Enemies were many in number and ferocious fighters. However during such a time [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] rose to fight against the Aztecs and managed to beat them and completely stop their invasion.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] values [Root.GetHerHis] life above all. When playing a game of chess with Death for [Root.GetHerHis], [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] sacrificed a loved to increase [Root.GetHerHis] chances of surviving.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a great strategizer.[Root.GetSheHe] managed to beat Death in a game of chess without any tricks.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a perfect spy with enough charm and skill to seduce even Death itself and wits to outplay Death in a chess game.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a perfect spy with enough charm and skill to seduce even Death itself and wits to outplay Death in a chess game.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a ruler known for [This.GetHerHis] ruthlessnes and cruelty that strike fear into all [This.GetHerHis] enemies.[Root.GetSheHe] even managed to intimidate Death in a cchess game for [This.GetHerHis] life.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] managed to beat Death in a game of chess for [This.GetHerHis] life.

If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a legendary general who claimed victory against a nation much more powerful than [Root.GetHerHis] own nation.
Valkyrie [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a fearsome warrior with countless victories in wars and duels.Many believe her to be a valkyrie descended on Earth from Valhalla.
Blood of Cynane [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Cynane, the daughter of Philip was famous for her military knowledge: she conducted armies, and in the field charged at the head of them. In an engagement with the Illyrians, she with her own hand slew Caeria their queen
column3: and with great slaughter defeated the Illyrian army.

column2: Amazon [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Famed by her prowess in battlefield and duel arena people liken [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] to great female warriors of Amazons.
Blood of Khawlah [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Khawlah bint al-Azwar was a Muslim warrior and later a military leader. She has been described as one of the greatest female military leaders in history and was once compared with Khalid Bin Walid by the opponents in the battlefield.
Dora Milaje [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Historically Dora Milaje are the personal bodyguards of the Black Panther and potential wifes for him.They are one of the greatest female warriors in the world.
Blood of Artemisia [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Artemisia I of Caria was a queen of the ancient Greek city-state of Halicarnassus and of the nearby islands of Kos, Nisyros and Kalymnos, within the Achaemenid satrapy of Caria.She fought as an ally of Xerxes I, King of Persia against the independent Greek city states during the second Persian invasion of Greece. She personally commanded her contribution of five ships at the naval battle of Artemisium and in the naval Battle of Salamis.
Blood of Boudicca [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Boudicca was a queen of the British Celtic Iceni tribe who led an uprising against the occupying forces of the Roman Empire. Although her rebellion failed, she is considered a British folk hero.
Blood of Zenoibia [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Zenoibia was a third century queen of the Palmyrene Empire in Syria.Zenobia was a cultured monarch and fostered an intellectual environment in her court, which was open to scholars and philosophers.In reaction to the campaign of the Roman emperor Aurelian in 272, Zenobia declared her son emperor and assumed the title of empress (declaring Palmyra's secession from Rome). The Romans were victorious after heavy fighting
column3: the queen was besieged in her capital and captured by Aurelian, who exiled her to Rome where she spent the remainder of her life.

column2: Blood of Jeanne d'Arc [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Jeanne d'Arc claimed to have received visions of the archangel Michael, Saint Margaret, and Saint Catherine of Alexandria instructing her to support Charles VII and recover France from English domination late in the Hundred Years' War.After she was captured by Burgundian faction, she was put on trial by the pro-English bishop and burned at the stake on 30 May 1431, dying at about nineteen years of age. Later the trial against her was reexamined by an inquisitorial court authorized by Pope Callixtus III and charges against her was dropped and she was declared a martyr. In 1920 she got canonized as a Roman Catholic saint
Blood of FuHao [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Fu Hao was one of the many wives of King Wu Ding of the Shang dynasty and also served as a military general and high priestess.
Blood of Tomyris [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

Tomyris was a Massagetean ruler who reigned over the Massagetae. Tomyris led her armies to defend against an attack by Cyrus the Great of the Achaemenid Empire, and, according to Herodotus, defeated and killed him in 530 BC.
Blood of Khutulun [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
Khutulun was a Mongol noblewoman and wrestler. The most famous daughter of Kaidu, a cousin of Kublai Khan, her father was most pleased by her abilities, and she accompanied him on military campaigns.
Warrior Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick][This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a fearsome warrior with countless victories in wars and duels.
Hannibal Blood of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick]

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] conquered Rome and fulfilled dream of [Root.GetHerHis] ancestors.[Root.GetSheHe] succeded what Hannibal Barca, a legendary Carthagian warrior, couldn't and claimed [Root.GetHerHis] place as one of the best warriors in history.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is renowned throughout the world for many great books he wrote on various topics.He proved his skill in writing and vast knowledge and earned respect of everyone.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] defeated armies of Carolingians and formed an empire for Norse.[Root.GetHerHis] success surely changed history.Rise of Carolingians is stopped before it gets too big and it is time for rise of Norse.

Spouses of [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] tend to have a much shorter life expectancy than expected.Although there isn't evidence linking [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] directly to her husbands deaths rumours seem to indicate this.

Actions and achievements of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] strongly resembles those of legendary King Arthur.\nMany bards have already started singing about those similarities between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and King Arthur and more and more people start thinking [Root.GetTitledFirstName] must be a descendant of King Arthur every day.
They are right!
Your Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] tells you that [Root.job_spymaster.GetSheHe] discovered a sword in stone like the one mentioned in the legend.
Show me the way!

When you reach the forest your spymaster leads you, you see the sword in stone. Even while embedded in stone, beauty of this sword is enchanting.\nYou feel a strange power urging you to reach out to sword.\nAs you grab the hilt of the sword you feel a strong rush of power.
Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil, is rightwise king born.

Wise and brave ruler of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] is celebrated as a Saxon hero in all the nordic lands.[Root.GetHerHis] success against Carolingians stopped their advance into nordic lands and by forming an empire for Norse [Root.GetSheHe] created a strong foundation for nordic people to flourish.
Odin owns you all.

At first people thought it was a coincidence but spouses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] continues dying early and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] keeps remarrying.There are numerous rumors about why spouses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] die early and each has a different reason but they all have the common point blaming [Root.GetTitledFirstName] for her spouses deaths.It is unknown if there is any truth to the rumor but majprity of the people believe it to be truth.
[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] is a black widow.

[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] celebrates [Root.GetHerHis] 100th birthday this year.Be it his friends or enemies, everyone is surprised and curious about his long life.\nSome say it is because he is loved by God, some say it is because of his healthy lifestyle some think it is because of expensive medicine and elixirs and some even accuse [Root.GetHerHim] of magic and witchcraft.\nAs for what truth is no one but [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] knows.
Long live [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick].

It has been dream of muslims and Turks for many generations to conquer Constantinople. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] finally achieved the dream and put an end to Roman rule over Constantinople, Queen of Cities.
From now on Turks are the emperors of Rome.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] appalled [Root.GetHerHis] peers by consuming flesh of 5 of [Root.GetHerHis] children.\nIt is not known if [Root.GetSheHe] did it because he feared fate of Cronus or if [Root.GetSheHe] did it to imitate Cronus in a deranged show of devotion or prayer.
I have blood of Titans.

[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the kingdom of Israel, rebuilt the Temple of Jerusalem and reestablished the High Priesthood of Judaism and established Jewish law as the law of the land. Many people believe he is the prophesied Massiah.
